Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Mana khandi shikali kario tawe! Mulitsa okhumanya
Shikali kario tawe! Mumanyangakhwo amachesi katoto
Mana khandi toto bwene muliyilola nende imoni yatoto
Mana khandi toto mulirebwa inyanga eyo okhulondokhana nende obwokholo
